name: 2D Platformer (hatfie73)
description:
2D Platformer Project for CAS 117

I would suggest downloading rather than playing on the website, as some tilemaps are only affected in WebGL.

Modifications include:

1) Modifications to Music

2)New Tilemaps and Stories including a "Water Level"

3) Altering Player Settings for Water Level

Credits:

Made by Cameryn Hatfield 2021
